column4: Is there any way to fix the driver Totem uses to play videos? Its totally screwed on my laptop.
Perhaps using a different driver it will fix it?
are you using totem-gstreamer or totem-xine?
1 sec..
totem-xine worked much better for my machine ... but it's not the default.
It flashes pink lines on the screen and wierd lines with the movie, bunch of wierd artifacts..
i see..
How do i know which one im using?
dpkg -l totem*
ii  totem          0.99.15.1-1    A simple media player for the Gnome desktop
rc  totem-gstreame 0.99.15.1-1    A simple media player for the Gnome desktop
ii  totem-xine     0.99.15.1-1
o_O
I must have 3 different ones.
OK, you only have the xine one - gstreamer is "rc" which means it's been removed
I see.
Do you have an nvidia card on your machine?
Funny it only shows the wierd artifacts when on window mode, full screen is fine.
Let me see if mplayer it
mplayer does it*
are you using an nVidia card?
